options.content: Metrics and Logs Dashboard for Namespace ${namespace}

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!="", service="kube-prometheus-stack-kubelet"}) by (pod)

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]) + rate(container_fs_writes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))

sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|dasd.+)", container!="", namespace="$namespace"}[5m]))
